Pie-Hub.summary: React app with back end running on a Raspberry Pi. Shows useful information in one place including: room temperature and humidity, task list from Notion, and time.
description: React app hosted on a single-board computer (RPi) along with a RESTful API written with Express.js

Connected an indoor temperature and humidity sensor
Wired up a relay board to control appliances through software
